name: Spirit Chase
description:
✿ Description ✿

Spirit chase is a game about a young girl running away from her demons in a fantasy forest world. She is struggling to find her way back home when tragedy strikes and the spirit of the forest is angered, she must now flee if she wants to survive.

The game is a runner in which you are required to jump and dash to dodge obstacles to complete the level. There are coin pickups available which determine your end score if you complete the game.

✿ Key Features ✿

★ Jump and dash your way to victory

★ Gorgeous authentic pixel art

★ Beautiful forest background

★ Charming style

✿ Info✿

Release: 26/06/2015

Platform: PC

Price: Free

✿ Personal Bio ✿

I am currently a student at Media Design School in Auckland, New Zealand. I am looking to get into concept art in game design as drawing is my passion.

✿ Contact ✿
